description:
Masayoshi is a guy who used to admire superheros from childhood, thanks to his grandfather who loved action hero tv shows and comics.
He always has had a dream of becoming the hero of justice, so he asks a designer to design some superhero uniforms for him under the title of samurai flamenco. however, he has no abilities and logic over his actions and usually screws up and asks Gotou to rush over and help him. He is also a famous model
name: Hazama Masayoshi
